channel.title: Merry Christmas To All of MoparistheBest Forums! (My last topic for a long time)
channel.description:
Hello Mopar Community, I would just like to wish you all a Merry Christmas. This will be my last topic or post for a while because I will be in Hawaii for the next 4 months and I can't take my computer with me (unfortunatly)...Anyway, feel free to post fairwells and Merry Christmas to all.
-0wn4g3 R4ngr.

item.title: Merry Christmas To All of MoparistheBest Forums! (My last topic for a long time)
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

dave5534:

Y cant you take your computer

One of the reasons is that the salt water kicks the crap out of computers.

Anyways, happy holidays, and good luck in Hawaii, I’ve been there before, it’s great.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Looks at sig

ohhhhhh…[/quote]thats PhoneScape and theres no moparscape server its just hybridscape built into the client and he could use Endar

item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

Merry Christmas/Happy holidays mopar

And yeah jme, I would love to start snowboarding and shit, but in michigan its like 40-50 F usually! Its rediculous. A couple nights ago we got rain ffs… :-/

Oh and take a computer for fapping. More ram=more porn does a pelvic thrust with daviddude

Read full topic

item.title: Merry Christmas To All of MoparistheBest Forums! (My last topic for a long time)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“kmb, post:10, topic:38712”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=54522.msg675508#msg675508 date=1166936096]

I love the cold
Can’t wait for snowboarding, but I heard this year is gonna be a pretty crappy winter
[/quote]
Don’t you just love the greenhouse effect? It’s going to be a lousy winter here in southern finland too. Almost no snow on the ground atm, meh :/.

on topic: Merry Christmas.
0wn4g3 r4ngr: HF in Hawaii[/quote]
There is no snow here, and we usually have it right now to the point where you cant look out your windows because the snow banks are so huge.

Appearntly all were gonna get is a lot of freezing rain and stuff

Read full topic
